hiveArticle.title: Color Challenge - Thursday Green - View From Train
hiveArticle.body:
So recently I traveled from Bangalore to Kolkata by train which is approximately 2000 Kms distance and it takes close to 35 hours of train journey. You get to see a lot of awesome scenes. One of the scene is shown below where there are lot of trees just at the starting of the hill.

![IMG_20180110_144842_2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmT9s1Z4Seo1aqzRWu7zFBcsEucs2YY1TEdWmf1SSuBnXi/IMG_20180110_144842_2.jpg)
